ModuleDescription: All living organisms generate waste. The prehistoric waste generated by animals and humans gives us clues to past climate and living conditions. Today’s waste generation by humans is higher than ever. This module examines the relationship between human and waste generation. It will also study the various types of waste generated from current food production, households and industries and examine their impact on the environment. Various options will be explored to manage waste better in order to ensure environmental sustainability and to create business opportunities such that they can be made useful. Singapore’s waste management issues will also be investigated.
